description:
Interact with JIRA issues and Bamboo builds in Visual Studio 2008, 2010, 2012, and 2013. The Atlassian Connector for Visual Studio puts the most common issue and build-related activities into your IDE, including:

* Creating JIRA issues
* adding and view JIRA comments
* perform workflow actions
* view latest build results
summary: Interact with JIRA issues and Bamboo builds in Visual Studio 2008, 2010, 2012, and 2013.
author: Atlassian
